sponsor: Johnson & Johnson Healthcare Products Division of McNEIL-PPC, Inc.
briefTitle: Clinical Trial in Females for Female Pattern Hair Loss
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-Center Parallel Design Clinical Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of 5% Minoxidil Foam vs. Vehicle in Females for the Treatment of Female Pattern Hair Loss (Androgenetic Alopecia)
summary: This is a six month clinical trial to evaluate the effectiveness and safety in women with Female Pattern Hair Loss (FPHL), comparing a 5% minoxidil topical foam (MTF) formulation applied once a day versus a topical foam vehicle (placebo) formulation applied once a day.
